definitions: To assemble, to set up, to mount (furniture, a show, a business)
To get on, to board (a vehicle)
To mount, to cover (in animal breeding)
To stage, to put on (a play, an event)
To amount to, to total (a sum)
examples: Vamos a montar los muebles nuevos.
Hay que montar las claras a punto de nieve.
La compañía va a montar una obra de teatro.
El gasto total montó a cien euros.
